content:
Prodam Računalnike P4 od 2400Mhz do 3000Mhz
Računalniki so pregledani in so brezhibni.

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx


1: IBM THINKCENTRE S50 P4 3000Mhz, 512MB, 40GB, DVD-Rom

- Desktop, P4 3000Mhz HT procesor, 512 Mb DDR ram, 40 Gb IDE HDD, SATA controler, DVD-Rom, Disketna enota, Intel i865GE chipset, Grafična Intel Extreme Graphics2 64 Mb onboard, Zvočna kartica AC'97 onboard, Mrežna kartica Intel Pro/100 VE onboard, 8 x USB (2x spredaj), 2 x serial (RS-232) port, 1 x paralell (LPT) port, 2 x PCI slot-a
Cena = 129ur

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

2: PC Maxdata VMX - Pentium4 2800, 512MB, 40GB, CD-rom

- Procesor Pentium4 HT 2800 MHz, 512 Mb DDR-ram, 40 Gb HDD, CD-Rom, Disketna enota, Osnovna plošča Asus P4P800-VM, Intel i865G chipset, Grafična Intel Extreme Graphics 2 - 64 Mb, 1 x AGP za drugo grafično kartico, AD 1980 onboard zvočna kartica, Mrežna kartica Intel Pro/1000 VM onboard, 2 x SATA contorller, 6 x USB, 2 x serial (RS-232) port, 1 x paralell (LPT) port, 3 x PCI slots, 2 x 5,25, Velikost: 430 x 192 x 429 mm
Cena = 135Eur


xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx


3: IBM THINKCENTRE S50 P4 2800Mhz, 512MB, 40GB, DVD-Rom

- Desktop, P4 2800Mhz HT procesor, 512 Mb DDR ram, 40 Gb IDE HDD, SATA controler, DVD-Rom, Disketna enota, Intel i865GE chipset, Grafična Intel Extreme Graphics2 64 Mb onboard, Zvočna kartica AC'97 onboard, Mrežna kartica Intel Pro/100 VE onboard, 8 x USB (2x spredaj), 2 x serial (RS-232) port, 1 x paralell (LPT) port, 2 x PCI slot-a
Cena = 119ur

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx


4: IBM THINKCENTRE S50 Celeron 2400Mhz, 512MB, 40GB, CD-Rom

- Desktop, Celeron 2400Mhz procesor, 512 Mb DDR ram, 40 Gb IDE HDD, SATA controler, CD-Rom, Disketna enota, Intel i865GE chipset, Grafična Intel Extreme Graphics2 64 Mb onboard, Zvočna kartica AC'97 onboard, Mrežna kartica Intel Pro/100 VE onboard, 8 x USB (2x spredaj), 2 x serial (RS-232) port, 1 x paralell (LPT) port, 2 x PCI slot-a
Cena = 99ur

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

5: DELL OptiPlex GX200 P3 933Mhz, 128MB, 10GB

- Procesor Pentium III 933Mhz, 128 Mb RD-Ram, Disk 10 GB, Grafična onboard, Zvočna kartica onboard, CD-Rom, 2xUSB, LAN, Disketna enota
Cena = 49 Eur

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

7: Cisco Router SOHO 91
naprava je namenjena naprednim uporabnikom. Naložen je CRWS.
Ethernet Broadband Router SOHO91-K9OY6-M
Karakteristike:
- 32MB RAM-a
- 8MB Flash
- Software-Based IP Security (IPSec) 3DES Encryption
- Multiuser IPSec Pass-Through
- Multiuser Point-to-Point Tunneling Protocol (PPTP) Pass-Through
- IPSec NAT Pass-Through
- Four-port 10/100-Base-T with autosensing MDI/MDX
- Terminal Access Controller Access Control System Plus (TACACS+)
Priključki:
- 1x 10BASE T WAN Port
- 4x 10/100 BASE T Ports
- 1x Console Port
Dodatki:
- napajalni kabl
- mrežni kabl
- konzolni kabl
Cena = 79Eur

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx


Na vseh računalnikih je naložen operacijski sistem.

Ravno tako servisiram računalnike po ugodnih cenah.
Možno je dobiti tudi druge modele. Za vse nadalnje informacije pokličite.
inf: 040/278-212 - Gorenjska
author: marez
